Question.Subject: Will CP have the old hairstyles back in 2010?
Question.Content:
I see so many girls in club penguin wearing that hair style! heres some pics: http://misslilperson.files.wordpress.com/2008/01/wigs.jpg (the flutterby. it also comes in blode)
and the other blonde side pony tail! (the one that preps wear!) will they be comming back this year?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Depends on Club penguin...
There is a item obtainer trainer where you can get items that you have missed.
Check this website:
http://thecptimes.info/video.aspx
